title: Scale Function for B2 Inputs
description:
BIT_TOGGLE_B inverts a specifed bit at IN.
BIT_TOGGLE_W(2#0000_1111, 2) = 2#0000_1011
BIT_TOGGLE_W(2#0000_1111, 7) = 2#1000_1111
name: SCALE_B2

input.name: in1
input.description: First input value to be scaled.

input.name: in2
input.description: Second input value to be scaled.

input.name: K
input.description: Scaling factor applied to the combined inputs.

input.name: O
input.description: Offset added to the result after scaling.

input.name: in1_min
input.description: Minimum value for the first input used in scaling.

input.name: in1_max
input.description: Maximum value for the first input used in scaling. Defaults to 1000.0.

input.name: in2_min
input.description: Minimum value for the second input used in scaling.

input.name: in2_max
input.description: Maximum value for the second input used in scaling. Defaults to 1000.0.

output.name: SCALE_B2
output.description: The scaled output value calculated from the input parameters.

return_value.description: The result of the scaling operation applied to the inputs.
